sentences.en: Adjust the slider to specify what users are allowed to see.
sentences.cn: 调节滑块可以指定用户能够查看哪些内容.

sentences.en: Advanced video acceleration setting selected. Click Restore Defaults to use the slider.
sentences.cn: 已选择高级视频加速设置.请单击“还原默认设置”以使用滑块.

sentences.en: And you're supposed to be on the other side, so l can use the slider.
sentences.cn: 并且现在你应该是在另外一边, 这样我就可以用滑板了.

sentences.en: But it is variable during the motion of the FPS slider.
sentences.cn: 然而,实际上FPS支座 的滑动摩擦系数在FPS滑 块的运动过程中是变化的.

sentences.en: Chien - Ming Wang strikes out 12 a newly refined slider.
sentences.cn: 王建民用最新精炼的滑球三振12名打者.

sentences.en: In the Pointer Trail area, drag the Length slider.
sentences.cn: 在“指针尾部”区, 拖动“长度”滑杆.

sentences.en: Keywords: hard disk drive, slider bearing, flying height, simulation.
sentences.cn: 关键词: 硬碟机、座轴承 、 行高度 、 值模拟.

sentences.en: Move the slider to set the privacy level for this zone.
sentences.cn: 移动滑块,为此区域设置隐私等级.

sentences.en: Move the slider to set the security level for this zone.
sentences.cn: 移动滑块设置该区域的安全级别.

sentences.en: Said Wang : " The sinker was good, but the slider sometimes stayed up . "
sentences.cn: 王建民 说: 我的伸卡球很好, 但是 滑球 有时候不会跑.

sentences.en: Scroll through the document using the slider bar on the right of the window.
sentences.cn: 用窗口右边的滑动条滚动文件.

sentences.en: To scroll back up, click the scrollbar track above the scroll slider.
sentences.cn: 若要倒退滚动, 点击滚动条轨迹内滚动块上面的区域.

sentences.en: To the right of the Color slider, click the Map button.
sentences.cn: 在颜色滑竿的右边, 单击Mapbutton[ 图谱按钮].

sentences.en: Use this slider to choose the speed of the double - click action.
sentences.cn: 使用这个滑块来选择双击动作的速度.

sentences.en: When the slider to a certain location, the end inspiratory.
sentences.cn: 当滑块转至一定位置时, 吸气完毕.

words.tran_cn: 滑动；滑落；不知不觉陷入
滑动；使滑动；悄悄地迅速放置

trans.tran_cn: 滑雪者，滑冰者，会滚动之物 ，[棒]弧度不大的曲球，滑块
